column3: @theuni can you have a look at the depends/build system changes here?\n

ACK

Definitely not the person to sign off on the depends/build system changes but what I see strikes me as pretty thorough. I did a bit of a deep dive awhile back and seem to recall what's here as being everything that's related to the tool.

Woohoo, great to see this! Thanks to everyone involved.

Build-side looks good. The .travis.yaml can drop the hostname hack since we no longer require java, but that can be done as a follow-up.

utACK.
@theuni Did I remove the right hack?\n
